pain_points.description: The website looks outdated and uninviting.
supporting_quotes: It just feels like an old person's home
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may try to ignore the design or adapt to it, but it's not a satisfactory solution.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users may feel disconnected or less engaged with the community.

pain_points.description: Difficulty in finding specific events and information on the website.
supporting_quotes: I find difficulty in accessing on the website.
I'm often looking for what events am I registered to.
I'm often looking for who else is going to the events that I'm going to.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may resort to contacting support or searching through multiple pages manually.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Frustration and wasted time leading to lower satisfaction with the service.

pain_points.description: Lack of community resources and information for newcomers.
supporting_quotes: Wouldn't it be great if we could just have an area that's questions from people moving to Santa Barbara.
I just think that that would be a great resource for the club to offer.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Newcomers may seek information elsewhere, such as other websites or community forums.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Newcomers may feel lost or unsupported in their transition.

pain_points.description: Need for improved self-service options for customer support.
supporting_quotes: I'd like to have it be more self-service when it comes to customer support.
Too often, it's the simplest issues that get people hung up.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may reach out for help via email or phone, which can be time-consuming.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Increased frustration and reduced efficiency in resolving issues.

pain_points.description: Need for better event calendar functionality.
supporting_quotes: I think we could do a whole lot better.
To improve the calendar app, just to make it much easier to find events through browsing as well as searching.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may use external calendars or reminders to keep track of events.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users miss out on events or feel overwhelmed by the process of finding them.

pain_points.description: Desire for a help feature or chatbot for new users.
supporting_quotes: Kind of provide more of a route for new users to make it easy for them to do what they want to do.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may rely on existing support channels or community members for assistance.
pain_points.impact_on_user: New users may feel unsupported and overwhelmed.
